thread.title: Oracle US conference to focus on integrated cloud customers
thread.title_full: Oracle US conference to focus on integrated cloud customers

title: Oracle US conference to focus on integrated cloud customers
text:
Oracle US conference to focus on integrated cloud customers 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
The Oracle OpenWorld 2015 conference, being held in San Francisco from October 25 to 29, will bring together Oracle customers, its partners and prospective clients to offer more than 2,500 educational sessions, key innovations and IT exhibitions....
